item.description:
We'll be getting experts from all areas of mobile development together to discuss the development-related issues that matter to you.  Topics will include:

  • The lastest tips & tricks for iOS and Android development
  • Android fragmentation: Does it really matter?
  • HTML5: Realistic alternative to native apps today?
  • Cross-platform frameworks (Appcelerator, PhoneGap, etc.)
  • WP7, UDID deprecation, location APIs, security, and whatever else you want to discuss...

Pizza will be provided, courtesy of Progress Ventures (www.progressventures.com)!
item.name: Mobile Developers Meetup 9
